General.Name: Doctorglasses Chain Co Ltd
General.Description: Doctorglasses Chain Co.,Ltd. engages in retail of eyewear in China. It offers optical glasses, such as sunglasses, reading glasses, etc.; contact lens; and fitting services through online and offline stores. The company offers glasses under the President glasses, Dr. glasses, Zèle, and Stone artificial brand names. It also offers professional optometry services. The company was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.
General.Address: No. 5016, Shennan East Road, Shenzhen, China, 518001
